function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proliferation of contagious diseases due to improper cleaning and sanitation processes.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and sanitation protocols, educate employees, provide proper training.","Technologies":"Cleaning robots, UV-C disinfection, automated hand sanitizers.","People":"Employees, visitors, contractors.","Owner":"Building management, employers, health and safety agencies."},{"Description":"Misinterpretation or misclassification of data during the pre-processing stage.","Impact":"Inaccurate categorization and analysis leading to flawed conclusions and decisions.","Mitigation":"Implement manual checks, use multiple algorithms for data processing, involve subject matter experts.","Technologies":"Data validation tools, natural language processing algorithms, machine learning models.","People":"Data analysts, data scientists, subject matter experts.","Owner":"Data analytics team, data science team."}]}
